title: Advanced Shaping and Styling in Bonsai

questions.question: What is the purpose of creating deadwood features in bonsai?
choices: To kill parts of the tree
To add character and age to the bonsai
To make the tree grow faster
questions.answer: To add character and age to the bonsai

questions.question: What is 'jin' in bonsai?
choices: A deadwood technique creating the appearance of a dead branch
questions.answer: A deadwood technique creating the appearance of a dead branch

questions.question: What is 'shari' in bonsai?
choices: A deadwood technique creating the appearance of a stripped trunk
questions.answer: A deadwood technique creating the appearance of a stripped trunk

questions.question: Which tool is commonly used to strip bark when creating jin?
questions.answer: Jin pliers

questions.question: What is typically applied to preserve deadwood features in bonsai?
questions.answer: Lime sulfur or jin seal

questions.question: What is the primary goal of leaf reduction techniques in bonsai?
choices: To make the tree grow taller
To create proportionate leaves that enhance the illusion of a full-sized tree in miniature
To reduce the need for watering
questions.answer: To create proportionate leaves that enhance the illusion of a full-sized tree in miniature

questions.question: What is defoliation in bonsai?
choices: Adding new leaves to the tree
Removing all or most leaves during the growing season
questions.answer: Removing all or most leaves during the growing season

questions.question: When is defoliation typically performed on deciduous trees?
questions.answer: Early summer

questions.question: What is the purpose of pruning to inner growth in bonsai?
choices: To force energy to inner buds and increase ramification
To reduce the need for watering
questions.answer: To force energy to inner buds and increase ramification

questions.question: How does root pruning affect leaf size in bonsai?
choices: It has no effect on leaf size
It can lead to smaller leaf size by restricting root growth
It causes leaves to change color
questions.answer: It can lead to smaller leaf size by restricting root growth

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to fertilizer use for leaf reduction?
choices: Increase nitrogen to promote larger leaves
Reduce nitrogen to limit leaf size
questions.answer: Reduce nitrogen to limit leaf size

questions.question: What is grafting in bonsai?
choices: A method of painting the trunk
A process of joining parts from two plants so they grow as one
questions.answer: A process of joining parts from two plants so they grow as one

questions.question: What is air layering in bonsai?
choices: A method of suspending bonsai in the air
A technique for creating aerial roots
A way of stacking bonsai pots
A method of propagation to create new roots on a branch
questions.answer: A method of propagation to create new roots on a branch

questions.question: What is the first step in creating shari on a bonsai trunk?
choices: Marking the area to be worked on
questions.answer: Marking the area to be worked on

questions.question: Which tool is used to create taper when making jin?
questions.answer: Knob cutters

questions.question: What is the purpose of using wire brushes in deadwood creation?
choices: To create texture on the deadwood
questions.answer: To create texture on the deadwood

questions.question: Why is timing crucial when performing defoliation?
choices: It affects the tree's ability to recover and produce new growth
It determines the color of the new leaves
questions.answer: It affects the tree's ability to recover and produce new growth

questions.question: What is the benefit of air layering in bonsai?
choices: It makes the tree grow faster
It creates new trees with mature characteristics
questions.answer: It creates new trees with mature characteristics

questions.question: What should be considered when selecting a branch for jin creation?
choices: The overall design and balance of the tree
The number of leaves on the branch
questions.answer: The overall design and balance of the tree

questions.question: What is the purpose of approach grafting in bonsai?
questions.answer: To add branches where needed

questions.question: What material is typically used to wrap the area in air layering?
questions.answer: Sphagnum moss

questions.question: What is the purpose of applying rooting hormone in air layering?
questions.answer: To encourage root formation

questions.question: How does reducing nitrogen in fertilizer affect bonsai?
questions.answer: It limits leaf size

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of creating shari on a bonsai trunk?
choices: To make the trunk grow faster
To mimic natural trunk damage and add character
questions.answer: To mimic natural trunk damage and add character

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common method for leaf reduction in bonsai?
questions.answer: Trunk chopping

questions.question: What is the main advantage of thread grafting in bonsai?
choices: It allows for precise placement of new branches
It changes the tree's leaf color
questions.answer: It allows for precise placement of new branches

questions.question: What should be monitored closely after performing air layering?
questions.answer: Root development

questions.question: Which technique is most useful for reducing the height of a tall bonsai trunk?
questions.answer: Air layering

questions.question: What is the purpose of carving grooves when creating jin?
choices: To make the branch grow back
To allow for better water absorption
To create a more natural, weathered appearance
questions.answer: To create a more natural, weathered appearance

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of grafting in bonsai?
choices: It eliminates the need for watering
It can change foliage type on parts of the tree
It makes the tree immune to pests
questions.answer: It can change foliage type on parts of the tree
